headline: CTI CRYOGENICS CONTROLLER
description: Controller for use with On-Board High Vacuum Pumps  Part Number: 8052300G001    CTI Cryogenics 8011
specstable:
Manufacturer CTI Cryogenics
Model 8011
Description Controller
Other Information For use with CTI 8500, 1020R, or SC air-cooled compressor.
Operates on single phase or three phase power
Operates up to three On-Board cryopumps
Power Requirements 220/440 V 50/60 Hz
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 14.000 in (35.6 cm)
Depth 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Height 7.000 in (17.8 cm)
Weight 30 lb (14 kg)
